name: Hutijin
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.Infernal Despair: Each creature within 15 feet of Hutijin that isn't a devil makes saving throws with disadvantage.
traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If Hutijin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Magic Resistance: Hutijin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Regeneration: Hutijin regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Hutijin dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

options.Attack: Hutijin attacks once with his mace.
options.Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions): Hutijin releases lightning in a 20-foot radius. All other creatures in that area must each make a DC 22+1d14 + 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
